skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of applying a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking 1 random debuff from the target and placing it on all enemies under [Weaken] debuffs. 

Decreases the targetâ€™s Turn Meter by 10% if they are not under any debuffs.

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. 

After attacking, has an 80% chance of placing two 5% [Poison] debuffs for 2 turns on all enemies without [Weaken] debuffs. These [Poison] debuffs cannot be blocked or resisted.
